channel.title: I neeeeed help!
channel.description:
Im fairly new to the whole "Private server" thing and i cant edit my client. i downloaded moparscape and tried to edit hybridscape that comes with it. i can only edit the character!! i need to know how to edit shops, npcs, and itemdrops moparscape doesnt have any java files which is the way to change things and when i download other servers i cant get it to work on moparscape so i can run it from my comp( it says when clicking start server{left buttom} like when playing teh hybridscape it says itr cant find the cfg files even if i still have them
Plzzzz help!!!!!!!!!

item.title: I neeeeed help!
item.dc:creator: @justbrad93 justbrad93
item.description:
@justbrad93 wrote:

Thanks i suspected something like that but is there a way to use a downloaded server onto the moparscape client ?

Read full topic

item.title: I neeeeed help!
item.dc:creator: @Zaron Zaron
item.description:
@Zaron wrote:

rofl… you can’t edit hybridscape… you gotta download a server

Read full topic

item.title: I neeeeed help!
item.dc:creator: @jurm jurm
item.description:
@jurm wrote:

You cannot edit the one that comes with it. You have to download a different source such as Cheezscape, Testscape, P16, or Pimpscape.

Read full topic
